testcase.name: a tennis game takes 2 players starting on 0 points each
when playerOne is on 1 and playerTwo is on 0: fifteen love is returned
when playerOne is on 0 and playerTwo is on 1: love fifteen is returned
when playerOne is on 1 and playerTwo is on 1: fifteen all is returned
when playerOne is on 2 and playerTwo is on 1: thirty fifteen is returned
when playerOne is on 1 and playerTwo is on 2: fifteen thirty is returned
when playerOne is on 2 and playerTwo is on 2: thirty all is returned
when playerOne is on 3 and playerTwo is on 2: forty thirty is returned
when playerOne is on 2 and playerTwo is on 3: thirty forty is returned
A player wins when they score 4 times whilst the other player scores 3 or less
when both players are on 40 points each, deuce is retuned
when a player scores whilst on deuce they gain advantage[0]
when a player scores whilst on deuce they gain advantage[1]
when a player scores whilst on deuce they gain advantage[2]
when a player scores whilst on deuce they gain advantage[3]
when a player scores on advantage they win[0]
when a player scores on advantage they win[1]
when a player scores on advantage they win[2]
when a player scores on advantage they win[3]
